sounds.name: Annoyance 1
sounds.text: I wanna be all I can be.

sounds.name: Annoyance 2
sounds.text: I tell you what, I think I'll join up.

sounds.name: Annoyance 4
sounds.text: Hope they don't put me in any tight spaces.

sounds.name: Annoyance 5
sounds.text: Ahh, what the hell; I need that college money.

sounds.name: Annoyance 3
sounds.text: You ain't from around here, are you?

sounds.name: Annoyance 4
sounds.text: I can't believe they put me in one of these things.

sounds.name: Annoyance 5
sounds.text: And now I gotta put up with this too?

sounds.name: Annoyance 6
sounds.text: I told 'em I was claustrophobic—I gotta get outta here!

sounds.name: Annoyance 7
sounds.text: I'm locked in here tighter than a frog's butt in a watermelon seed fight.

sounds.name: Error 1
sounds.text: I can't build it. Som'in's in the way.

sounds.name: Ready
sounds.text: You want a piece o' me, boy?

sounds.name: Acknowledgement 3
sounds.text: Jacked up and good to go.

sounds.name: Annoyance 2
sounds.text: Are you gonna give me orders?

sounds.name: Annoyance 4
sounds.text: I vote we frag this commander.

sounds.name: Annoyance 5
sounds.text: How do I get outta this chicken shit outfit?

sounds.name: Annoyance 6
sounds.text: You want a piece o' me, boy?

sounds.name: Annoyance 7
sounds.text: If it wasn't for these damn neural implants, you'd be a smokin' crater by now.

sounds.name: Annoyance 2
sounds.text: *Flame spurt* Haha, that's what I thought.

sounds.name: Annoyance 3
sounds.text: I looove the smell of napalm.

sounds.name: Annoyance 5
sounds.text: Are you tryin' to get invited to my next barbecue?

sounds.name: Acknowledgement 3
sounds.text: State the nature of your medical emergency.

sounds.name: Annoyance 1
sounds.text: I've already checked you out, Commander.

sounds.name: Annoyance 5
sounds.text: His EKG is flatlining! Give me a defib stat!

sounds.name: Annoyance 3
sounds.text: Keep it up; I dare ya.

sounds.name: Annoyance 4
sounds.text: I'm about to overload my aggression inhibitors.

sounds.name: Annoyance 2
sounds.text: I don't have time to fuck around!

sounds.name: Annoyance 4
sounds.text: And I'll scrap you along with the aliens!

sounds.name: Annoyance 2
sounds.text: I'm about to drop the hammer…

sounds.name: Annoyance 1
sounds.text: Last transmission breakin' up… come back.

sounds.name: Annoyance 2
sounds.text: I'm just curious… why am I so good?

sounds.name: Annoyance 3
sounds.text: I gotta get me one of these.

sounds.name: Annoyance 4
sounds.text: You know who the best star fighter in the fleet is?

sounds.name: Affirmation 1
sounds.text: In the pipe, five by five.

sounds.name: Affirmation 2
sounds.text: Hang on, we're in for some chop.

sounds.name: Annoyance 1
sounds.text: When removing your overhead luggage, please be careful.

sounds.name: Annoyance 2
sounds.text: In case of a water landing, you may be used as a flotation device.

sounds.name: Annoyance 3
sounds.text: To hurl chunks, please use the vomit bag in front of you.

sounds.name: Annoyance 4
sounds.text: Keep your arms and legs inside until this ride comes to a full and complete stop.

sounds.name: Annoyance 1
sounds.text: I like the cut of your jib.

sounds.name: Annoyance 2
sounds.text: E equals MC… D'oh, let me get my notepad.

sounds.name: Annoyance 3
sounds.text: Hmm, fusion eh? I'll have to remember that.

sounds.name: Annoyance 4
sounds.text: Who set all these lab monkeys free?

sounds.name: Annoyance 5
sounds.text: I think we may have a gas leak.

sounds.name: Annoyance 6
sounds.text: Do any of you fools know how to shut off this infernal contraption?

sounds.name: Annoyance 7
sounds.text: Ahh… the ship… out of danger?

sounds.name: Annoyance 1
sounds.text: This is very interesting… but stupid.

sounds.name: Annoyance 2
sounds.text: I have ways of blowing things up.

sounds.name: Annoyance 3
sounds.text: Not equipped with shields? Well then, buckle up!

sounds.name: Annoyance 4
sounds.text: We are getting way behind schedule.

sounds.name: Annoyance 5
sounds.text: I really have to go, number 1.

sounds.name: Annoyance 4
sounds.text: I knew I shoulda stayed in bed this mornin'.

sounds.name: Annoyance 4
sounds.text: I knew I shoulda stayed in bed this mornin'.

sounds.name: Annoyance 2
sounds.text: Doesn't take a telepath to know what you're thinkin'.

sounds.name: Annoyance 3
sounds.text: You get off on annoying people, don't you?

sounds.name: Annoyance 4
sounds.text: You may have time to play games…

sounds.name: Annoyance 5
sounds.text: …but I've got a job to do.

sounds.name: Acknowledgement 1
sounds.text: How can I be of service?

sounds.name: Annoyance 3
sounds.text: But I think you're getting a little too familiar.

sounds.name: Annoyance 5
sounds.text: I am Duran. Who are you?

sounds.name: Annoyance 6
sounds.text: I told you my name. It's Duran, Duran!

sounds.name: Annoyance 9
sounds.text: Is there something I should know?

sounds.name: Annoyance 1
sounds.text: Been a general for fifteen years…

sounds.name: Annoyance 2
sounds.text: …now I'm takin' orders from a pup.

sounds.name: Annoyance 4
sounds.text: Y'all need some good ol' fashioned discipline!

sounds.name: Annoyance 1
sounds.text: Been a general for fifteen years…

sounds.name: Annoyance 2
sounds.text: …now I'm takin' orders from a pup.

sounds.name: Annoyance 4
sounds.text: Y'all need some good ol' fashioned discipline!
